text:
@realDonaldTrump If you’re FINALLY getting good reviews, it’s because you’re FINALLY doing better. 
The problem is your inadequate response in January & February & even half of March, when U obviously weren’t taking the CoronaVirus seriously....since you did EIGHT rallies during that time.
